content.rendered:
Zilliqa (ZIL) Market Prediction 2020

Just like seesaw cryptocurrencies of the past and the present are fluctuating up and down, yet they are considered promising in the long term and the midterm gains. Looked upon Zilliqa is presumed to follow the same success story, like the top crypto Bitcoin, Ethereum and others, in the coming future? Let’s see what’s the buzz and prediction for Zilliqa by some of the market experts looks like.

ChangeNow – How Big the Growth Will Be

“Zilliqa is the project that promises to be able to live up to their promises and expectations of expanding as it does not have the issue of the overloading. They need unlimited work to be hosted on their network in order to cope in their race against Ethereum. If more and more developers started to adopt Zilliqa as their native blockchain by next year, we could see a  great shift. Currently, the price is at its low, there is enough space for improvement. The question here is not if Zilliqa will grow, it’s a matter of how big the growth will be.”

CoinSwitch – $0.776

CoinSwitch expressed, Zilliqa might have a bright future in terms of its partnership with the other growing projects. It might help the network to get much more fame in the cryptocurrency world. In the coming time, Zilliqa might tend to give a tight competition to the major cryptocurrencies, which can lead ZIL to adopt its own blockchain network leaving Ethereum behind. By the end of 2020, ZIL might progress to $0.776.

Global Coin Report – $1

Global Coin Report is quite auspicious for Zilliqa, considering its back to past acquirements, and predicts that by the end of 2019, Zilliqa might touch 1 USD.

Wallet Investor – Down to $0.00373

The popular cryptocurrency, Forex, Stock forecast-based online resource chooses to unprogressive statements predicting that ZIL might go down to $0.00373.

Zilliqa (ZIL) Price Prediction 2020

There are strong feelings of Zilliqa to rise that are tremendously based on the various factors like the platform’s history, performance, calculation, and speculation in the market.

Zilliqa is undoubtedly the next generation updated version of blockchain technology. Besides the actual accomplishments, the network’s professional and talented team is coming up with some more cool features. Recently in November, Zilliqa has announced its tie-up with the company Elliptic, which primarily deals with the blockchain analysis and serves either cryptocurrency exchange and financial services. This partner that deals with anti-money laundering software make the Zilliqa more secure, safe, and attractive for investors.

Currently, as shown in the chart above, Zilliqa is running the lowest in comparison to its past record. It doesn’t only mean its bad phase; looking from a different angle it’s the best time for developers to invest in Zilliqa (ZIL), taking into consideration skills and performance of the cryptocurrency. By the end of 2020, Zilliqa can hit up to $0.900.

What is Zilliqa (ZIL)?

Zilliqa, a blockchain network technology with ZIL token as its local cryptocurrency, was introduced back in 2017. Zilliqa (ZIL) uses sharding technology to sleek the solidarity process, which provides a better platform for blockchain-based networks like Ethereum and others. It helps to host the distribution of applications or transactions in a much faster, easier and successful way.

Zilliqa was established with the one-point goal of enhancing the scalability of cryptocurrency networks, giving a better source for the developers to throw out their ideas freely not worrying about network trafficking.

Zilliqa only operates through its cryptocurrency ZIL as the coin provides it the utility platform. All the crucial functions of network relating to the smart contracts, app development, and fund transactions are handled using the ZIL token. The issue of the token is limited to 21 billion.

Zilliqa (ZIL) price at the time of writing is $0.00530890, with a 24-hour trading volume of $11,724,868. Price is on the rise, with 9.8% in the last 24 hours. Zilliqa has a circulating supply of 9.3 Billion coins and a max supply of 13 Billion coins. It is ranked at position 88 on coinmarketcap.

Zilliqa (ZIL) Price Chart

(ZIL price from 2018 till the present day with ATH)

Zilliqa (ZIL) Features

One of the key features of Zilliqa is its high level of productivity, stretching the network scale size. From a user’s concern, this is a big plus, which leads individual users and entire companies to prefer Zilliqa. The act utilizes sharding, a common decentralized network, which is further divided into separate components, smaller networks, known as shards. It directly means if the network grows, the platform becomes more and more efficient, stronger, and faster.

Zilliqa’s new smart and effective features can positively shape the scalability of the blockchain network. It delivers a smart contract with a set of the highest priority features in a locked time-frame, quick, and made-to-order security budget. Zilliqa is a blockchain program which presumably has the strongest possible security.

How to buy Zilliqa (ZIL)?


One easy option to manage, buy and sell cryptocurrencies is Atomic, which supports 300+ cryptocurrencies including all the major ones like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, and others. It is very convenient plus it adds up proper measures to ensure security.

Zilliqa will be soon available for buying in Atomic wallet but there are other platforms you can do it now and then hold and manage ZIL in the wallet smoothly.

Simply download the app on your desktop or mobile (Android or iOS respectively), create a strong password, save and keep secret the 12-word mnemonic seed phrase, as it is the only key to your valuable funds.

How to exchange Zilliqa (ZIL)?

Zilliqa is not available for exchange in Atomic now, but the status will be updated in the near future. In general, you can exchange many other cryptocurrencies as there are a plenty of exchange pairs. The process can be done at a high speed and with excellent rates.
